description: Darc is an archiving system for use in media projects that allows developers to contain and use their data files from .darc files that store data in a b2 compressed and AES encrypted (optional) format.

License: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)

longdescription: Darc is an archiving system for use in media projects that allows developers to contain and use their data files from .darc files that store data in a b2 compressed and AES encrypted (optional) format.
